title: Storming of the Bastille
summary: On July 14, 1789, Parisian revolutionaries stormed the Bastille fortress-prison, a symbol of royal tyranny, marking the violent start of the French Revolution. The event overthrew the Ancien Régime and spread the ideals of liberty, equality, and fraternity across Europe and beyond. July 14 remains France's national holiday, Bastille Day, to this day.
